comments:
Build: I20070606

Command links in help don't seem to work when there is another dialog open.

1) Open Help > Help Contents
2) Navigate to Workbench User Guide > Concepts > Accessibility features > Fonts and Colors...
3) Scroll down to the "Colors" section
4) Click the first link (General>Appearance>Colors and Fonts)
5) Without closing the preference dialog, Alt+Tab to go back to the help window
6) Click the next link (General > Search)

An error occurs. 

org.eclipse.core.commands.ExecutionException: No activeWorkbenchWindow found while executing org.eclipse.ui.window.preferences
